attributes.action: Take the north east out of tier 4 when CASES ARE FALLING !!!!!
attributes.additional_details:
Since COVID has come around cases have dropped and we ARE UNDER THE NATIONAL AVERAGE-/ there is facts and statistics to prove this our country and council are failing us. Due to mental health being effected the support we can receive is now on the way down again and less and less hope for mentally crippled. 
Maternity services are also being affected with dads and partners not being allowed to support partners until labour change the system for us not to spite your fucking bank check
attributes.background: The north east inCLUDING COUNTY DURHAM is having cases fall and yet we are being trapped in these tiers four!!!our economy is slowly dying out due to loosing money loosing customers and loosing hope. We need to be able to live and breath to bring our health back to normality!!! Can’t you see

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Since you started your petition a National Lockdown has been announced.  We're not sure whether you'd like that not to apply in areas with falling cases, or for areas with falling cases to be in a lower tier when the lockdown ends. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
